name: geologic
content:

relating to geology (= the study of the rocks and similar substances that make up the earth's surface), or to the geology of a particular area or place : The country lies along two geologic fault lines, one of which caused this earthquake. The Arctic island's geologic features are similar to those on Mars.
More examplesFewer examplesCaves and unusual geologic formations are scattered across the whole region.The jellyfish had evolved by the middle of the Cambrian geologic period.The geologic record shows that coral reefs have suffered near extinction over billions of years, and have returned.
